summary: Dedicated and multilingual Customer Service Specialist with 5+ years of experience in high-volume contact center and HR support environments. Skilled in managing complex inquiries, de-escalating conflicts, and ensuring customer satisfaction across diverse industries. Fluent in French and English, with a proven ability to build trust, communicate effectively, and deliver exceptional customer experiences. Seeking to contribute strong problem-solving skills, adaptability, and professionalism to a dynamic organization focused on service excellence.

workExperience.title: Customer Service Agent
workExperience.description: Provided front-line support for French-speaking clients, ensuring efficient issue resolution and excellent customer experiences.
responsibilities: Handled a high volume of inbound French calls, consistently meeting response time and quality metrics.
Assessed customer needs effectively and provided accurate information tailored to individual cases.
Resolved complex inquiries using company systems, ensuring compliance with internal policies and procedures.
Managed escalations and complaints, delivering solutions within agreed timeframes and ensuring customer satisfaction.

workExperience.title: Human Resources Agent
workExperience.description: Supported HR operations by assisting employees and candidates with inquiries, documentation, and problem resolution.
responsibilities: Responded to employee queries in French and English, maintaining confidentiality and professionalism.
Facilitated onboarding processes by ensuring accurate documentation and timely communication.
Provided guidance on HR policies, benefits, and procedures, ensuring compliance with company standards.
Handled sensitive situations with empathy, offering solutions and escalating appropriately when necessary.

workExperience.title: Customer Service Agent
workExperience.description: Delivered personalized customer support in a fast-paced outsourcing environment, specializing in French-language service.
responsibilities: Handled large volumes of calls while maintaining high accuracy and customer satisfaction.
Analyzed customer issues and provided appropriate solutions with attention to detail.
Built rapport with clients to strengthen customer relationships and loyalty.
Monitored unresolved issues and followed up to ensure timely resolution.

workExperience.title: Customer Service Agent
workExperience.description: Supported international customers with product inquiries, feedback management, and service resolution.
responsibilities: Responded to inquiries in both French and English across multiple communication channels.
Maintained accurate records of customer interactions to improve reporting and analytics.
Assisted with feedback collection, ensuring customer voices were reflected in service improvements.
Delivered empathetic, solution-driven support for escalated cases.

workExperience.title: Customer Service Agent
workExperience.description: Provided multilingual customer service in a call center environment, consistently exceeding performance benchmarks.
responsibilities: Answered French-language calls with professionalism and courtesy.
Assisted customers with billing, account, and service-related issues in a clear and effective manner.
Collaborated with colleagues and supervisors to streamline call handling processes.
Consistently achieved customer satisfaction targets by offering timely and accurate solutions.
